title: Online Shopping App (E-Commerce)
about: A full-stack CRUD-based shopping application where users can browse, add, edit, and delete items. Includes product storage, user management, and a responsive UI for seamless navigation.

title: Expense Monitor
about: A multi-user CRUD application for tracking, updating, and analyzing personal expenses. Features secure user-specific data management and a responsive interface.

title: Movie Reviews App
about: A complete movie browsing and review management system with CRUD features, RESTful APIs, and a clean, responsive UI.

title: Video Game Purchase App
about: A game search and recommendation system simulating a Steam-like experience. Implements AVL Trees, Graphs, Heaps, and a Trie-based autocomplete/autocorrect system for efficient search and ranking.

title: Think Board
about: A MERN-based notes application designed for fast, minimal, and distraction-free note-taking. Features real-time CRUD operations, organized note management, and a clean UI focused on productivity.

title: Rocket Animation
about: A C++ and OpenGL-based graphics project that animates a rocket using classic computer graphics algorithms, including Bresenham’s line drawing, scanline polygon fill, Cohen–Sutherland line clipping, and various 2D transformations.
